name: Infinity Space V.1
description:
Hello!!!

== Welcome to Infinity Space ==

Dodge Asteroids! , Survive year by year! , Don't let your energy bar down! , Escape the Black Hole!

It's the year 2045, A Black Hole has been spotted on a direct course to Earth.  The UN knowing that Earth is lost decided to build a ship... The U.N.S.O Endurance. Inside this vessel lies, a database of Human Culture and known Human Knowledge alongside a number of colonists in Hibernation. 

Manning the ship is a Highly intelligent A.I. Its task is to lead the Human race to safety from the black hole and find a new home for Mankind to flourish once more. The Ships Thrusters Push the Endurance further and further to the vast unknown and the Ai watches as the Black Hole slowly nears Earth quickly obliterating it in the process.

But unknown to the Ai.. the black hole slowly changes course to the lone ship. Additional Credits: Blackhole Sprite: DanielMania123 [Deviantart] Music: Jota-R [Youtube], Savfk and Whitesand
